name: DEMO Elina: Return Of Succubus
description:
This is a demo web version. It may have some glitches.

Full version available at : www.patren.com/witchstudios

Video NSFW: https://streamable.com/yhev9b

Video Outfits 

Elina, is a 3rd person dungeon beat-em-up adventure.

Combining the look appeal of MMD anime and freeflow combat from batman arkham city. Finish off enemies with over 15 unique, voice acted, sex moves. Customize Elina with unlockable outfits and hairstyles. In this game you'll meet with lots of heroes, make different choices and see really well made animations with sexy girls. This is only a demo of this series. The game will continue to release monthly on patreon with more content. 

Controls:

Primary Mouse - Attack

Secondary Mouse - Counter (when enemies have a green circle)

Combo: Secondary Mouse + Q ( Counter + summon sex clone ally)

F - Toggle First Person Mode

I - Inventory (lots of clothes)

C - View character

E - Use (sex defeated NPC's, sex NPCs)
